attributes.action: GIVE EVERYONE A DAY OFF MONDAY 12TH JULY
attributes.additional_details: GIVE EACH OF US A DAY OFF FROM IT ALL… after the past year during Covid we should unite and become one and show our England squad our support This Sunday 11th and let ALL workers  HAVE Monday 12th OFF
attributes.background: I’m sure after the last year everyone deserves to back their country & party in style ( Covid rules still apply) it’s football and we all deserved to back them and show them out support….

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584
